body: When the dude (killed?) the sons of bitches before they attempt to do it, he looked dope af. Like finally it's about time for someone to break the cliché. Also the hell is up with the bully girl? Talking about emotionally unstable. Well, i didn't understand what they were saying since i don't understand japanese, though i wish i understand.
I am not asking for translation, i wish for it
If only it's all in either Katakana or Hiragana, I might be able to help the TL's.
